Crew role changed.script:
{if event.role = 'Gunner':
  You are now this crew's gunner.
|elif event.role = 'Fighter':
  You are now this crew's fighter pilot.
|elif event.role = 'Idle':
  You have been unassigned from active duty.
}

Died.name: Died

Docked.description: Triggered when your ship docks at a station or outpost

Docking cancelled.name: Docking cancelled
Docking cancelled.description: Triggered when your ship cancels a docking request at a station or outpost

Docking denied.script:
{Pause(2000)}

We have been denied docking

{if event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
    because our fighter is deployed
|elif event.reason = "Distance":
    because we are too far from the station
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
    because the station's controlling faction doesn't like us
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
    because there is no space available
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
    because we have recently committed an offence against them
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
    because there are no landing pads that can accomodate the size of our ship
}.
Docking denied.name: Docking denied
Docking denied.description: Triggered when your ship is denied docking at a station or outpost

Docking granted.name: Docking granted
Docking granted.description: Triggered when your ship is granted docking permission at a station or outpost

Docking requested.name: Docking requested
Docking requested.description: Triggered when your ship requests docking at a station or outpost

Docking timed out.script: No response to our docking request.
Docking timed out.name: Docking timed out
Docking timed out.description: Triggered when your docking request times out

Engineer progressed.script: {event.engineer} has given you access to grade {event.rank} blueprints.

Engineer progressed.description: Triggered when you reach a new rank with an engineer

Entered normal space.name: Entered normal space
Entered normal space.description: Triggered when your ship enters normal space

Entered signal source.script:
{Pause(2000)}

{if event.threat < 2:
  Entered signal source.
|elif event.threat = 2:
    Caution: medium-threat signal source.
|elif event.threat = 3:
    Warning: high-threat signal source.
|else:
    Danger: very high-threat signal source.
}

Exploration data purchased.script:
{OneOf("Purchased {OneOf('system', 'exploration')} data for {P(event.system)}",
            "{OneOf('system', 'exploration')} data for {P(event.system)} now available",
            "{Occasionally(3, '{ShipName()} has')} Received {OneOf('system', 'exploration')} data for {P(event.system)} from station services",
            "Receipt of {P(event.system)} {OneOf('system', 'exploration')} data confirmed")}.

Exploration data for {len(event.systems)} systems sold for {Humanise(event.reward)} credits

{if len(event.firsts) > 0:
    , with an additional bonus of {Humanise(event.bonus)} credits for
    {if len(event.firsts) = 1:
        one first discovery
    |else:
        {len(event.firsts)} first discoveries
    }
}
.

Galnet unread report.script:
{set articles to GalnetNewsArticles("Article")}

{if len(articles) = 0:
    You have no unread news
|elif len(articles) = 1:
    You have one unread news item
|else:
    You have {len(articles)} unread news items
}.

Heat damage.name: Heat damage
Heat damage.description: Triggered when your ship is taking damage from excessive heat

Heat warning.name: Heat warning
Heat warning.description: Triggered when your ship's heat exceeds 100%

Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 4:
       commander
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 5:
        sir
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 11:
        my lord
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 12:
        your grace
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 13:
        your royal highness
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 14:
        your majesty
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating.rank = 0:
        commander
    |else:
        {cmdr.federationrating.name}
    }
|else:
    commander
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Hull damaged.script:
{if event.vehicle = vehicle:
    {if event.health < 40:
        Danger:
    |elif event.health < 60:
        Warning:
    |elif event.health < 80:
        Caution:
    }
    {OneOf("Hull", "Hull integrity", "Integrity", "Structural integrity")} {Occasionally(3, "is")} at {event.health}%.
}
Hull damaged.name: Hull damaged
Hull damaged.description: Triggered when your hull is damaged to a certain extent

Landing pad report.script:
{set landingpad to state.eddi_context_landing_pad_pad}
Landing pad {landingpad} is at
{if landingpad = 1:
    six o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 2:
    six o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 3:
    six o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 4:
    six o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 5:
    seven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 6:
    seven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 7:
    seven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 8:
    seven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 9:
    eight o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 10:
    eight o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 11:
    nine o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 12:
    nine o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 13:
    nine o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 14:
    nine o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 15:
    nine o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 16:
    ten o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 17:
    ten o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 18:
    ten o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 19:
    ten o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 20:
    eleven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 21:
    eleven o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 22:
    eleven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 23:
    eleven o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 24:
    twelve o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 25:
    twelve o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 26:
    one o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 27:
    one o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 28:
    one o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 29:
    one o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 30:
    one o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 31:
    two o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 32:
    two o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 33:
    two o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 34:
    two o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 35:
    three o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 36:
    three o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 37:
    three o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 38:
    three o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 39:
    four o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 40:
    four o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 41:
    five o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 42:
    five o'clock near
|elif landingpad = 43:
    five o'clock mid
|elif landingpad = 44:
    five o'clock far
|elif landingpad = 45:
    five o'clock far
}
, as you enter with the green lights on your right.

Landing pad report.description: Report on the location of a landing pad

Material threshold.script:
{if event.level = 'Minimum':
    {_ Gone below the minimum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventory", "Supplies")} of {event.material.name} has fallen below your minimum.
|elif event.level = 'Maximum':
  {_ Gone above the maximum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventory", "Supplies")} of {event.material.name} has grown above your maximum.
|else:
    {_ Moved around the desired level }
    {if event.change = 'Increase':
        You have reached your desired level of {event.material.name}.
    |else:
        You are below your desired level of {event.material.name}.
    }
}

{OneOf("Current stock is {event.amount}",
       "Currently holding {event.amount}",
       "{event.amount} on-board")}.

Mission completed.script:
{if event.reward > 0:
    Payment of {Humanise(event.reward)} credits {Occasionally(2, 'from {P(event.faction)}')} {OneOf('received', 'confirmed')}.
|elif event.donation > 0:
    {OneOf("Donated {Occasionally(2, '{Humanise(event.donation)} credits')} to {Occasionally(2, 'a grateful')} {P(event.faction)}",
                 "{P(event.faction)} has {Occasionally(2, 'gratefully')} received your donation {Occasionally(2, 'of {Humanise(event.donation)} credits')}",
                 "{P(event.faction)} thanks you for your donation {Occasionally(2, 'of {Humanise(event.donation)} credits')}"
    )}.
|else:
    Mission completed.
}
{for commodityreward in event.commodityrewards:
  {commodityreward.amount} tonnes of {commodityreward.commodity} {OneOf("now on-board", "also received", "confirmed on-board")}.
}

System faction changed.name: System faction changed
System faction changed.description: Triggered when there is a change in the controlling faction of a watched system

System report.script:
{_ Fetch from context }
{set reportsystem to SystemDetails(state.eddi_context_system_system)}

{if !reportsystem.name || reportbody.name = "":
    I'm not sure which system you are asking about.
|else:
    {P(reportsystem.name)} is

    {if reportsystem.population && reportsystem.population > 0:
        {if reportsystem.allegiance = "Federation":
            a Federation
        |elif reportsystem.allegiance = "Empire":
            an Empire
        |else:
            an independent
        }
        {if reportsystem.government:
            {reportsystem.government}
        |else:
          system
        }
        {OneOf("of", "with a population of", "home to", "supporting")} {Humanise(reportsystem.population)} {OneOf("people", "souls")}
        {if reportsystem.power:
            , {OneOf("aligned to", "allied with", "controlled by")} {P(reportsystem.power)}
        }.

        {if reportsystem.faction:
          {P(reportsystem.faction)} is the {OneOf("controlling", "local", "immediate")} {OneOf("power", "faction")}.
        }

        {if len(reportsystem.stations) = 0:
          There are no stations present
        |else:
            {if len(reportsystem.orbitalstations) = 0:
                {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                    There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} planetary station
                |else:
                    There are {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
                }
            |elif len(reportsystem.orbitalstations) = 1:
                There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} orbital station
                {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                    and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
                |elif len(reportsystem.planetarystations) > 1:
                    and {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
                }
            |else:
                There are {len(reportsystem.orbitalstations)} orbital stations
                {if len(reportsystem.planetarystations) = 1:
                    and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
                |elif len(reportsystem.planetarystations) > 1:
                    and {len(reportsystem.planetarystations)} planetary stations
                }
            }
        }
        in this system
    |else:
       unpopulated
   }.
}
System report.name: System report
System report.description: Function to report on the details of the contextual star system

System state changed.name: System state changed
System state changed.description: Triggered when there is a change in the state of a watched system

System state report.script:
{_ Fetch from context }
{set reportsystem to SystemDetails(state.eddi_context_system_system)}

{if !reportsystem.name || reportsystem.name = "":
    I'm not sure which system you are asking about.
|elif reportsystem.state && reportsystem.state != 'None':
    {P(reportsystem.name)}
    {if reportsystem.state = "Retreat":
        is in retreat
    |elif reportsystem.state = "War":
        is at war; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Boom":
        is undergoing a boom; there might be some good trading profits to be made here
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Civil Unrest":
        is experiencing civil unrest; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Civil War":
        is in civil war; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Famine":
        is in a state of famine; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Lockdown":
        is in lockdown; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Outbreak":
        is attempting to contain an outbreak of disease; caution is advised
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Expansion":
        is gearing up to expand to another system
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Bust":
        is financially bust
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Election":
        is electing new leaders
    |elif reportsystem.state = "Investment":
        is investing in its infrastructure
    }
    .
}
System state report.name: System state report
System state report.description: Report on the current state of the contextual system

Touchdown.name: Touchdown
Touchdown.description: Triggered when your ship touches down on a planet's surface

Trade data purchased.name: Trade data purchased
Trade data purchased.description: Triggered when you purchase trade data

Trade promotion.script: You have been recognised for your trading ability, {F("Honorific")}.
Trade promotion.name: Trade promotion
Trade promotion.description: Triggered when your trade rank increases

Trade voucher redeemed.name: Trade voucher redeemed
Trade voucher redeemed.description: Triggered when you redeem a trade voucher

Undocked.name: Undocked
Undocked.description: Triggered when your ship undocks from a station or outpost
